messages.message: Hi, I would not ask if 'Search' had any idea: Is there anyway I can rerun the extraction for the fields that are dependent on another field that changed in human review? I remember this question had been asked before but I can't find where? If not, will this be available in future? Or any suggestion to work-around this? In a simple example (SS), the Intake Sheet = Header Mapping, so it is empty because the app had empty results for Header Mapping --> When I filled the field Header Mapping, I want the Intake Sheet to get the updated content

a related ask was raised here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05BJCNKZAM/p1739383483634549)

based on that thread, it seems we are using https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-638 to track this

cc @jack.robbins @andy
Thanks. For now it is internal for Jira PI-77, but I feel I will have the same request in few weeks for Nationwide once I look into a use-case that is being prioritized.
